DOC.brief_summary: This protocol allows CML and Ph+ ALL subjects who are resistant to or intolerant of imatinib mesylate, to potentially benefit from dasatinib. It is intended to provide patients with access to dasatinib while awaiting reimbursement decision in Korea and it will also provide additional data on the safety of dasatinib in Korean population
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of CML or Ph+ ALL who have primary or acquired resistance to or intolerance of imatinib mesylate ECOG performance status score 0 2 Adequate hepatic, renal function
